name: io.github.shalevshalit/image-recognition-mcp
description: MCP server for AI-powered image recognition and description using OpenAI vision models. Supports both URLs and local file paths.

environment_variables.description: Your OpenAI API key for image recognition and description services
environment_variables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY

environment_variables.description: Optional custom base URL for OpenAI API calls (e.g., for proxies or alternative providers)
environment_variables.name: OPENAI_BASE_URL

environment_variables.description: Optional OpenAI model to use for image recognition (defaults to gpt-4o-mini, or google/gemma-3-27b-it:free if using OpenRouter)
environment_variables.name: OPENAI_MODEL
